basic.description: This course covers the study of confirmatory factor analysis, structural equation models, time-series models, and related topics and their application to marketing theory and practice.
basic.subject: MAR
basic.title: Quantitative Methods II: Psychometric and Econometric Approaches to Marketing

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAR 6979, STA 5206, STA 5207, STA 5707, or instructor permission.
